title: For sale: Gem 1887 Old Judge O'Rourke--SOLD
author: oldjudge

posts.post_title: For sale: Gem 1887 Old Judge O'Rourke--SOLD
posts.post_content:
For sale is one of the finest Old Judge O'Rourkes in the hobby. The image is beautiful. The back has some minor staining from scrapbook removal from the Cambridge Collection. SOLD

Thanks--Jay
hands free photography! impressive. Nice card as well.
Hi Scott! After months of practicing I can balance the card on my knee. I killed about 14 corners before I got this down--LOL.

Nice card, didn't take too long to find a new home.


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

Steve: The nice images always go quick. I will post another few this weekend.

Best--Jay
